body_html: Hi @facaiy , what you suggested works fine in the case when you already know nodes -> device mapping while creating the graph. But, for my case, I first want to construct the whole graph and then run some heuristic based algorithm on the complete graph and place them intelligently based on the nature of the complete graph (on runtime, dynamically instead of placing the whole graph across gpus statically before execution). Do you know if this feature/flexibility already exists in Tensorflow ?
